code:
sequenceDiagram
  participant App as App Container
  participant Net as Pod netns/iptables
  participant Gost as gost (sidecar)
  participant DMZ as DMZ gost
  participant Ext as External

  App->>Ext: TCP connect (original intent)
  Net-->>Gost: iptables REDIRECT to 127.0.0.1:15001
  Gost->>DMZ: relay (h2/ssh/quic etc)
  DMZ->>Ext: actual outbound connection
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，App Container、Pod netns/iptables的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有DMZ gost、External。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含TCP connect (original intent)、relay (h2/ssh/quic etc)这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是TCP connect (original intent)、relay (h2/ssh/quic etc)应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由TCP connect (original intent)、relay (h2/ssh/quic etc)组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有actual outbound connection。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，actual outbound connection就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达actual outbound connection结束。
